name: esumeq2sdv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, c2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))

comment: Equality deduction for extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)
